name: Words Royale (itch)
description:
A whole new kind of Battle Royale experience!

Words Royale is nothing like you've ever seen. Inspired by the massively popular word game, you can now play the wholesome game against other people and ruin the wholesomeness by having it be an intense, and sweaty, PVP word game.

Go up against 19 other people and battle for the Words Royale crown by guessing the secret word each round. 5 letters, 6 attempts. Will you guess it before it's too late?
Or, instead, test your skills in a single player streak mode where your only obstacles are time and your ability to perform under pressure. How many words can you guess?
